name: Together Co-Living
description:
Together Co-Living Melbourne offers a vibrant, community-focused living experience designed especially for longer stays of one month or more. We‚Äôre not a hotel‚Äîwe‚Äôre a co-living community that brings people together through shared spaces, coworking areas, and a packed calendar of 20+ social events each month, including movie nights, paint & sip sessions, BBQs, and more.

You‚Äôll have access to communal kitchens with induction cooktops‚Äîjust bring your own cutlery, plates, and cookware, or pick them up nearby. Weekly housekeeping and fresh linens are included, and if you need extra towels, just stop by our 24/7 reception‚Äîwe're always happy to help.

On-Site Facilities Include:

Whether you're working, studying, or exploring Melbourne, our welcoming community and convenient amenities make it easy to feel at home.
While Together Co-Living is built for longer stays, we also welcome short stays with very competitive weekly rates. Even better value is available for stays of 1, 3, or 6 months.

Payment Terms & Conditions
For companies referring guests, whether the guest is paying personally or the company is covering the account (without approved credit terms):
Short stays (under 1 week): $100 deposit required by check-in
Short-term bookings (up to 4 weeks): $250 deposit + 4 weeks paid upfront (within 72 hours of confirmation)
Mid-term bookings (5 to 13 weeks): $500 deposit + 4 weeks paid upfront (within 72 hours of confirmation)
Long-term bookings (13+ weeks): $1,000 deposit + 4 weeks paid upfront (within 72 hours of confirmation)

üîπ A $100 cleaning fee will be deducted from the deposit for stays longer than 5 weeks.
üîπ Accounts must always maintain a minimum of 4 weeks in credit.
üîπ Car parking available at $35 per car, per week for stays under 3 months.
